scripts.import:excel:http: node -e "(async()=>{const fetch=global.fetch|| (await import('node-fetch')).default; const url=process.env.API_URL||'http://localhost:5000/api/products/import'; const token=process.env.ADMIN_TOKEN||''; const path=require('path'); const fs=require('fs'); const filePath=path.resolve(__dirname,'uploads','menu_products_with_images.xlsx'); if(!fs.existsSync(filePath)){ console.error('File not found',filePath); process.exit(1);} const FormData = (await import('form-data')).default; const formData = new FormData(); formData.append('file', fs.createReadStream(filePath)); const res = await fetch(url,{ method:'POST', headers: token? { Authorization: 'Bearer '+token }:{}, body: formData }); const text = await res.text(); console.log(res.status, text); })()"
